home.p0: We are a small startup with a simple mission: to bring the Mediterranean diet into your home with healthy, hand-picked, and traditional products.

about-us.p0: We are Andreas and Stefanos, two people from Greece living and working in Denmark. Our roots go back to two small coastal villages — Gytheio and Aidipsos. We grew up by the sea, with the sun always above us and meals that were both delicious and, as we later realized, incredibly healthy. A big factor to both of these was olive oil; a delicacy which was always present at our table — either from our own family farm or from a neighbor’s — and back then, we didn’t think twice about it. It was just a part of life.
about-us.p1: It wasn’t until we moved to Denmark that we realized what we’d grown up with wasn’t so easy to find. The flavors we took for granted — good olive oil, feta and other products that were in abundance at home — were missing from Danish shelves. We wanted to share a little bit of what we had back home with people who care about what they eat. That’s why we created Mediterranean Boutique.
about-us.p2: Our mission is simple: to bring a little bit of our home to Denmark. But we want to do it the right way — the way we've learned here in Denmark: the Danish way. We work with producers who care for the environment and follow sustainable, organic practices, bringing only the best the Mediterranean has to offer.

health.health-description: Extra virgin olive oil isn't just delicious—it's a cornerstone of the Mediterranean diet, scientifically proven to support long-term health and wellness.
health.health-footer: Our extra virgin olive oil is a key component of the Mediterranean diet, recognized by UNESCO  as an Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity and supported by decades of nutritional research.
